NameNode.description: HDFS Name Node IP and port information.

Hostname.description: The DNS name or IP address of the Name Node in the customer's on premises HDFS cluster.

Port.description: The port on which the Name Node is listening on for client requests.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

QopConfiguration.description: Configuration information for RPC Protection and Data Transfer Protection. These parameters can be set to AUTHENTICATION, INTEGRITY, or PRIVACY. The default value is PRIVACY.

NameNodes.description: An array of Name Node(s) of the HDFS location.
NameNodes.markdownDescription:
An array of Name Node(s) of the HDFS location.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

BlockSize.description: Size of chunks (blocks) in bytes that the data is divided into when stored in the HDFS cluster.
BlockSize.markdownDescription:
Size of chunks (blocks) in bytes that the data is divided into when stored in the HDFS cluster.

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

ReplicationFactor.description: Number of copies of each block that exists inside the HDFS cluster.
ReplicationFactor.markdownDescription:
Number of copies of each block that exists inside the HDFS cluster.

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyProviderUri.description: The identifier for the Key Management Server where the encryption keys that encrypt data inside HDFS clusters are stored.
KmsKeyProviderUri.markdownDescription:
The identifier for the Key Management Server where the encryption keys that encrypt data inside HDFS clusters are stored.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 255  

Pattern: ^kms:\/\/http[s]?@(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])(;(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9]))*:[0-9]{1,5}\/kms$  

Update requires: No interruption

SimpleUser.markdownDescription:

---

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[_.A-Za-z0-9][-_.A-Za-z0-9]*$

The unique identity, or principal, to which Kerberos can assign tickets.

Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256

The Base64 string representation of the Keytab file.

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.description: ARN(s) of the agent(s) to use for an HDFS location.
AgentArns.markdownDescription:
ARN(s) of the agent(s) to use for an HDFS location.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Subdirectory.description: The subdirectory in HDFS that is used to read data from the HDFS source location or write data to the HDFS destination.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
The subdirectory in HDFS that is used to read data from the HDFS source location or write data to the HDFS destination.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 4096  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the HDFS location.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the HDFS location.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  

Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the HDFS location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the HDFS location that was described.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 4356  

Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw|hdfs)://[a-zA-Z0-9.:/\-]+$  

Update requires: No interruption
